name: The Front Yard
summary:
"Meat embraces you whole."

Chicago, 1883.

At the epicenter of bloody beef and pig innards live Fergal Byrne and Eoin Kairys, two New Yorkers who've moved to The Yards for work. Their days are drawn out, miserable, and smelly as they survive work just to sleep another night.

The Front Yard is a short, visual-novel-style RPG Maker game following the monotonous and mundane lives of two best friends who've been consumed by the guilt of living and meat they work with.
